languages.text: {n}Заворчав, словно дикий зверь, Ульфар обращается к вам:{/n} "Этот хвастливый гризхоф слишком часто поминает мою стаю. Чую, он знает, где мои братья. Перед тем, как мы окунемся в кровавую схватку, призови его на корабль и дай мне его допросить — я желаю услышать то, что ему ведомо... Пока еретики не отстрелили его трепливый язык".

{n}Ulfar lets out a bestial grumble and says to you,{/n} "That boastful grizhof talks too much about my pack. He knows where my brothers are, I can smell it. Before we dive into the carnage, summon him to your ship and let me question him — I wish to hear what he knows... while he still has not lost his blathering tongue to the heretics."
languages.original_text: {n}Заворчав, словно дикий зверь, Ульфар обращается к вам:{/n} "Этот хвастливый гризхоф слишком часто поминает мою стаю. Чую, он знает, где мои братья. Перед тем, как мы окунемся в кровавую схватку, призови его на корабль и дай мне его допросить — я желаю услышать то, что ему ведомо... Пока еретики не отстрелили его трепливый язык".

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了野兽般的低吼，对你开了口。{/n}“我的狼群怎么样，轮不到那个夸夸其谈的家伙说个没完。他知道我的兄弟们在哪里，我能闻得出来。在这场大屠杀开始之前，把他叫到你的船上来，让我来问问他。我想听听他都知道些什么……赶在他那条喋喋不休的舌头被异端分子扯下来之前。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a bestial grumble and says to you,{/n} "That boastful grizhof talks too much about my pack. He knows where my brothers are, I can smell it. Before we dive into the carnage, summon him to your ship and let me question him — I wish to hear what he knows... while he still has not lost his blathering tongue to the heretics."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了野兽般的低吼，对你开了口。{/n}“我的狼群怎么样，轮不到那个夸夸其谈的家伙说个没完。他知道我的兄弟们在哪里，我能闻得出来。在这场大屠杀开始之前，把他叫到你的船上来，让我来问问他。我想听听他都知道些什么……赶在他那条喋喋不休的舌头被异端分子扯下来之前。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar pousse un grognement bestial, puis s'adresse à vous :{/n} « Ce grizhof arrogant n'a que ma meute à la bouche. Il sait où sont mes frères, je le sens. Avant de passer au carnage, faites-le venir à bord de votre vaisseau et laissez-moi l'interroger. J'aimerais qu'il me dise ce qu'il sait... avant que les hérétiques ne lui arrachent sa langue trop bien pendue. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a bestial grumble and says to you,{/n} "That boastful grizhof talks too much about my pack. He knows where my brothers are, I can smell it. Before we dive into the carnage, summon him to your ship and let me question him — I wish to hear what he knows... while he still has not lost his blathering tongue to the heretics."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar pousse un grognement bestial, puis s'adresse à vous :{/n} « Ce grizhof arrogant n'a que ma meute à la bouche. Il sait où sont mes frères, je le sens. Avant de passer au carnage, faites-le venir à bord de votre vaisseau et laissez-moi l'interroger. J'aimerais qu'il me dise ce qu'il sait... avant que les hérétiques ne lui arrachent sa langue trop bien pendue. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーが獣の唸り声を上げ、話しかけてくる。{/n}「あの尊大な腑抜けは俺の群れのことを喋りすぎだ。俺は同胞たちがどこにいるのかわかる…臭いを感じる。大虐殺を始める前に、奴を船に呼び寄せて俺に質問をさせてくれ――奴が何を知っているのか聞きたい…奴が異端者にベラベラと喋る舌を引きちぎられる前にな」。
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a bestial grumble and says to you,{/n} "That boastful grizhof talks too much about my pack. He knows where my brothers are, I can smell it. Before we dive into the carnage, summon him to your ship and let me question him — I wish to hear what he knows... while he still has not lost his blathering tongue to the heretics."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーが獣の唸り声を上げ、話しかけてくる。{/n}「あの尊大な腑抜けは俺の群れのことを喋りすぎだ。俺は同胞たちがどこにいるのかわかる…臭いを感じる。大虐殺を始める前に、奴を船に呼び寄せて俺に質問をさせてくれ――奴が何を知っているのか聞きたい…奴が異端者にベラベラと喋る舌を引きちぎられる前にな」。
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar suelta un gruñido bestial y te dice:{/n} «Ese grizhof fanfarrón habla mucho de mi manada. Sabe dónde están mis hermanos, lo huelo. Antes de empezar la carnicería, llámalo a tu nave y déjame interrogarlo. Quiero oír lo que sabe... antes de que los herejes le arranquen esa lengua fétida que tiene».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a bestial grumble and says to you,{/n} "That boastful grizhof talks too much about my pack. He knows where my brothers are, I can smell it. Before we dive into the carnage, summon him to your ship and let me question him — I wish to hear what he knows... while he still has not lost his blathering tongue to the heretics."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar suelta un gruñido bestial y te dice:{/n} «Ese grizhof fanfarrón habla mucho de mi manada. Sabe dónde están mis hermanos, lo huelo. Antes de empezar la carnicería, llámalo a tu nave y déjame interrogarlo. Quiero oír lo que sabe... antes de que los herejes le arranquen esa lengua fétida que tiene».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar stößt ein animalisches Grollen aus und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Dieser prahlerische Grizhof redet zu oft über mein Rudel. Er weiß, wo meine Brüder sind, das rieche ich. Bevor wir in das Blutvergießen eintauchen, ruft ihn auf Euer Schiff und lasst mich ihn befragen — ich will hören, was er weißt ... so lange er seine geschwätzige Zunge noch nicht an die Ketzer verloren hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a bestial grumble and says to you,{/n} "That boastful grizhof talks too much about my pack. He knows where my brothers are, I can smell it. Before we dive into the carnage, summon him to your ship and let me question him — I wish to hear what he knows... while he still has not lost his blathering tongue to the heretics."

Bevor wir in das Blutvergießen eintauchen, ruft ihn auf Euer Schiff und lasst mich ihn befragen — ich will hören, was er weißt ... so lange er seine geschwätzige Zunge noch nicht an die Ketzer verloren hat."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, hayvani bir şekilde kükreyip sana şöyle diyor:{/n} "O kendini beğenmiş şerefsiz, sürümün adını ağzından düşürmüyor. Kardeşlerimin nerede olduğunu biliyor, kokusunu alıyorum resmen. Kıyıma dalmadan evvel onu gemine çağır, müsaade et sorgulayayım. Ne bildiğini duymak istiyorum. Kâfirler, o tatavacı dilini kesip almadan önce duymalıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a bestial grumble and says to you,{/n} "That boastful grizhof talks too much about my pack. He knows where my brothers are, I can smell it. Before we dive into the carnage, summon him to your ship and let me question him — I wish to hear what he knows... while he still has not lost his blathering tongue to the heretics."
